Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Cloud desktop and endpoint management modernization | ODSP1488
Description:
Discover how Nerdio Manager empowers enterprise IT teams to streamline cloud desktop and endpoint management at scale. Nerdio Manager for Enterprise is a powerful platform that helps IT professionals take control of Azure Virtual Desktop, Windows 365, and Intune management with ease. In this demo, we'll show you how Nerdio Manager for Enterprise can save you time, reduce costs, and streamline your entire virtual desktop infrastructure.
